meanings.definition: A printed or written emblem or device used as a symbol of a person or group.
meanings.sent1: The impresas on the shield represented the bravery of the knights.
meanings.sent2: She proudly displayed her family impresas on her banner.
meanings.sent3: The impresas on the flag made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His impresas shone brightly in the sunlight, catching everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The impresas etched on the ancient stone tablet told a story of valor.

meanings.definition: To undertake or carry out a task with determination and effort.
meanings.sent1: She impresased the challenge of climbing the mountain.
meanings.sent2: They impresased the construction project with great skill.
meanings.sent3: He impresased his friends by finishing the race first.
meanings.sent4: The team impresased their coach with their dedication to practice.
meanings.sent5: Impresasing the difficult task, she completed it ahead of schedule.
